item.title: Shortcut to Capture Ideas
item.description: One common theme from the majority of productivity articles/books that I read is to never let use your brain to store information. Use it to generate new ideas, to solve a problem, to think. But here is the thing: Sometimes when you are in a state of deep work, focusing on a task at hand, you might suddenly remember other tasks that you need to do later, or you might get an idea for other things that might not be related to your current task.

item.title: A Jupyter notebook - S3 Blogging Platform
item.description: Markdown is a good format to write almost anything. But we as a data scientist, use Jupyter Notebook, a lot. We could do a very rapid experiment, with plot, data frame, etc. This makes me wonder, is it possible to turn a jupyter notes into a blog post? I actually try to do this at my current company, to create some sort of knowledge management platform for our research team.

item.title: My Simple Hugo Theme
item.description: This website is built using hand crafted theme as a medium for me to learn Hugo theming. It’s not that beauty since I’m not a web developer, but I’ve learned so much about hugo and CSS/HTML in general. You can find the code in here.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, My name is Adib Pratama. I’m a Senior Data Scientist at one of the company in Indonesia. This is the place where I’ll share what I know (if I’m not busy being lazy). You can find me at: Github, or LinkedIn I don’t have a social media though, so yeah.

item.title: Linux VPN via PPTP dari Terminal
item.description: Sebagai salah satu cara untuk terhubung dengan resource yang ada di kantor ketika kita berada diluar (remote) adalah dengan menggunakan VPN. Ada beberapa jenis VPN, seperti openvpn dan pptp. Kali ini saya akan membahas proses koneksi VPN menggunakan PPTP di linux melalui command line. Langkahnya adalah : Memeriksa file yang dibutuhkan Membuat file konfigurasi Membuat koneksi Set default routing 1. Requirements Untuk dapat terhubung melalui VPN PPTP, ada 3 hal yang harus dimiliki, yakni:
